39184.summary: Some customers in the North Ridge area of St. Albert are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39184.title: July 3 – St. Albert (North Ridge surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
